Name: Citywars Tower Defense
About the game: More than 30 unique towers to build and counting! Discover their special abilities and upgrade them for maximum damage! Each merchant will be happy to show you their special inventory of new and exciting towers. Or take a chance with the mystery chess and get a random tower for less. Start gathering resources quickly before the enemies attack! Starting with no tools and no resources will be hard but craft the right tools and you will discover a whole new set of resources to cut, mine and gather. Craft the missing resources to upgrade your towers and beat the incoming monsters from reaching your life crystal. Use the crafting table to help you quickly progress. Each tool and each weapon in the game has a special skill tree to help you defend your crystal with greater ease. Choose between more than a dozen weapons and armors with unique features. Claim skill points by defeating waves and collecting the experience points from monsters.
